verses:
Are you tired of chasing pretty
rainbows? Are you tired of spinning
round and â€˜round? Wrap up all the
shattered dreams of your life, And at
the feet of Jesus, lay them down.

He never said you'd only see
sunshine, He never said there'd be
no rain; He only promised a heart full
of singing, About the very things that
once brought pain.
chorus:
Give them all; Give them all, Give
them all to Jesus; Shattered
dreams, wounded hearts, and broken
toys. Give them all, Give them all
Give them all to Jesus; And He will
turn your sorrow into joy!
